name: GO-17
description:
The great war has forced you into an abandoned Soviet bunker. You've survived the nuclear assault, but now you're stuck. With no obvious way out, you must make your way into the bunker, revealing it's memories and secrets along the way. However advance cautiously, as I do not believe you are alone.

    Explore a cold war bunker, find out it's purpose and secrets it once held. Contains psychological horror with eerie feelings. Play on full volume with headphones for the best experience.
